result.deskripsine: Welcome to the world of PokÃ©drock! This addon have a battle system, mounts, a lot of mechanics and real evolutions. If you want to enjoy the full experience of the addon, install all resource packs!
With this skin pack, you can play as the 3 Pokémon partners you can choose to begin your adventure in the Kanto region(Generation 1), as well as their evolutions in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition!

This skin pack includes the 3 Pokémon partners you can choose to begin your adventure in the Johto region(Generation 2), as well as their evolutions.

Skins include the fire Pokémon, Ccyndaquill, the water Pokémon, Totodile, and the grass Pokémon, Chikorita, as well as their evolutions as shown below and in the picture.

Cyndaquill->Quilava->TyphlosionChikorita->Bayleef->MeganiumTotodile->Croconaw->FeraligatrThis chart features all skins in this pack, and the Pokémon they evolve into and/or Pokemon they evolve from.

With this skin pack, you can play as the 3 Pokémon partners you can choose to begin your adventure in the Hoenn region(Generation 3), as well as their evolutions in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition!Skins include the fire Pokémon, Torchic, the water Pokémon, Mudkip, and the grass Pokémon, Treecko, as well as their evolutions as shown below and in the picture.

Torchic->Combusken->BlazikenMudkip->Marshtomp->SwampertTreecko->Grovyle->SceptileThis chart features all skins in this pack, and the Pokémon they evolve into and/or Pokemon they evolve from.

Note: These skins came from the internet, and were not made by me.

Attention, all Pokémon trainers!
It's time to pick your starter Pokémon!
With this skin pack, you can play as the 3 Pokémon partners you can choose to begin your adventure in the Sinnoh region(Generation 4), as well as their evolutions in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition!You can be the fire Pokémon, Chimchar, the water Pokémon, Piplup, and the grass Pokémon, Turtwig, as well as their evolutions as shown below and in the picture.

Chimchar->Monferno->InfernapePiplup->Prinplup->EmpoleonTurtwig->Grotle->TorterraThis chart shows all skins in this pack, and the Pokémon they evolve into and/or Pokemon they evolve from.

Note: These skins came from Planet minecraft and the Skindex, and were not made by me.
